title: Foreign exchange markets and aggregate demand

content.question: Japan and the United States are trading partners with flexible exchange rates. The currency of the United States is the dollar, and the currency of Japan is the yen. Which of the following changes in the United States will most likely increase aggregate demand in Japan?

choices.label: A decrease in the United States real gross domestic product
A decrease in the United States price level
A quota imposed by the United States on goods imported from Japan
An appreciation of the United States dollar relative to the yen
An increase in the demand for Japanese financial assets by American investors

content.answer: An appreciation of the United States dollar relative to the yen
